text: The Fiat Stilo is a car produced by Fiat from 2001 to 2007. The car was a modest sales success across Europe. == Models == File:Fiat Stilo front 20080711.jpg|3-door hatchback (Stilo) File:Fiat Stilo rear 20080711.jpg|3-door hatchback (Stilo) File:Fiat Stilo front.jpg|5-door hatchback (Stilo) File:Fiat Stilo rear.jpg|5-door hatchback (Stilo) File:Fiatstilo2009 frente.jpg|5-door hatchback (Brazilian Stilo) File:2007 Fiat Stilo Multiwagon.JPG|station wagon (Stilo Multiwagon) File:Stc198-giardinetta02w.jpg|crossover (Stilo Giardinetta) == Engines == === Petrol engines === * 1.2 16V 59 kW (80 hp) * 1.4 16V 66 kW (90 hp) and 70 kW (95 hp) * 1.6 16V 76 kW (103 hp) and 77 kW (105 hp) * 1.8 16V 98 kW (133 hp) * 2.4 20V 125 kW (170 hp) === Diesel engines === * 1.9 JTD 59 kW (80 hp), and 85 kW (116 hp) * 1.9 Multijet 8V 74 kW (100 hp) and 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.9 Multijet 16V 103 kW (140 hp) and 110 kW (150 hp) Stilo Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Fiat Stilo
